name: resume
description: An over-engineered JSON resume, because Microsoft Word was too bloated.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run bundle && mkdir -p docs && cp src/style.css docs/style.css && cp src/letter.md docs/letter.md && cp src/index.html docs/index.html && cp src/resume.json docs/resume.json && cp src/favicon.png docs/favicon.png && sed -i '7s@.*@    <script src="app-resume.bundled.js"></script>@' docs/index.html && sed -i '6s@.*@    <link href="style.css" rel="stylesheet" />@' docs/index.html
scripts.build:pdf: npm run deploy && npm run print:pdf
scripts.lint: npm run lint:lit-analyzer && npm run lint:eslint
scripts.checksize: rollup -c ; cat app-resume.bundled.js | gzip -9 | wc -c ; rm app-resume.bundled.js

author: The Polymer Authors
